html:
Black Friday is just hours away and as always, it’s a great chance for small business owners and entrepreneurs to score some great deals on tech, goods, and vital services they need for the coming year.

Oh yeah, it’s not a bad time to get some good prices on gifts for friends, families, co-workers, clients, and employees, too.

This week, our Small Business Breakdown crew will be talking all things Black Friday. They’ll be sharing some of their favorite Black Friday deals from their preferred vendors and businesses. There’s even a chance for viewers to share the best deals they found, too.

Black Friday and the days leading up to it can be a blitz of ads promoting the best prices on everything imaginable. And it may be difficult to keep it all sorted.

Well, let the Small Business Breakdown crew help you sort it all out this year and tell you the best deals for you, the small business owner and entrepreneur.

The show gets underway live at noon on Friday, Nov. 29. You can watch Small Business Breakdown live this week on YouTube, LinkedIn, and Facebook. Check out the links below to watch on your preferred platform.

    Joshua Sophy is the Editor for Small Business Trends and has been a member of the team for 16 years. A professional journalist with 20 years of experience in traditional media and online media, he attended Waynesburg University and is a member of the Society of Professional Journalists. He has held roles of reporter, editor and publisher, having founded his own local newspaper, the Pottsville Free Press.
